This property verifies that the count signal is properly reset to zero when the active-high reset signal rst_i is asserted.

The verification triggers on every positive edge of the clock signal clk_i, unless disabled by rst_i being low. When rst_i is high, the property requires that on the very next clock cycle, the count signal must equal a value of all zeros with a width of CW bits.

The assertion checks that exactly one clock cycle after rst_i becomes active, the count signal is completely cleared to zero, ensuring proper reset behavior in the design.
